title: 2 tips about Kled Q.
body:
First: His Q will give you vision of stealthed targets while it's latched onto them so try timing it when they're about to stealth for champions like twitch, rengar, wukong ect. 

Second: His Q counters fizz E. Connect the Q right before Fizz E's and as it's a leashed CC, he can't get rid of it and it pulls him out of the untargetable state.

replies.body: Same with Vladimir and Elise, I assume?

> [{quoted}](name=Aeszarck,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YRT2wgd8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-14T04:52:23.505+0000)
>
> Same with Vladimir and Elise, I assume?

Actually I haven't tested those but it definitely works on fizz.

> [{quoted}](name=HongChongDong,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YRT2wgd8,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-14T05:23:10.057+0000)
>
> Actually I haven't tested those but it definitely works on fizz.

Well, at least that's the most important one.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Watch Uber Dangers video about Kled. Towards the end of it he Q's a Vlad and kills him with it mid pool while pulling him closer.

Vlad should work the same, provided he stays within the leash range and doesnt slip out. Ditto for Elise, except since she has the opportunity to appear somewhere else entirely she might break the leash.
Well then, if Yoricks VGU doesn't appeal to me, guess who I want in my top 3 highst mastery points champions c:
Le Blanc's E still roots Vlad in his pool state, so my guess is that it's the same.

Works with Vladimir confirmed. Elise is highly likely as well. For any of you who do not understand why this happens, it's because these champions become untargetable during these spells, but are still able to take damage (I.e. ignite still ticks through vlad pool, fizz pole). The channeled yank then proceeds to go through, along with the proc damage

for vlad i think it still deals the damage and pulls him, but to my knowledge it doesn't take him out of the pool state

idk about elise
I have used it on vlad
another tip is on the end of his auto attacks
"Here's a tip, and a spear behind it!" {{champion:5}}

{{champion:240}}  "Just the tip, i'll promise i'll be gentle. No we're not gonna be gente, what do i look like? an ionian pansy? Speaking of ionians, you ever seen that fox lady? Oooo wee she lights a fire in my loins i tell ya hwat! She doesn't need that charmy thingermabob to suduce ol' kled here!"
I could go my whole life not reading about a fictional furry midgets loins, its a shame i didn't.

> [{quoted}](name=Zonkman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YRT2wgd8,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2016-08-15T07:04:33.915+0000)
>
> I could go my whole life not reading about a fictional furry midgets loins, its a shame i didn't.

Sadly i'm here to remind you fandom exists
Well now people can't hate Kled, he counters a champion in the Top 10 Most Hated by the Boards list.
As an added thing some people might not know is you can Q and E at the same time to make it easier to hit, so E once then E+Q right through the enemy and you'll hit it always.

its impossible to miss it at point blank range because of its targeting mechanics... with or without E! 

 its just that E gets you in so it combos well
Wukong will need to pre-emptively time W the moment you see the latch animation because it doesn't reveal stealth BEFORE hitting, only after.
Wouldn't the Fizz be using his E to avoid your Q?  How would you Q so it hits him before he Es?

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YRT2wgd8,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-14T10:34:47.021+0000)
>
> Wouldn't the Fizz be using his E to avoid your Q?  How would you Q so it hits him before he Es?

Noobs

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YRT2wgd8,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-14T10:34:47.021+0000)
>
> Wouldn't the Fizz be using his E to avoid your Q?  How would you Q so it hits him before he Es?

As a recent Kled main (probably sounds stupid, but its true) all you have to do is throw the bear trap at him as he dashes on to you.

Most likely in an instance that he dived you or something and tried to use his E to get out but you either Remounted or had your Q off cooldown. Or if you almost kill him and your Q is off cooldown so he tried to E away. Or if he goes in on you (Good Fizz's lead with their Q+W not their E) and you can  just Q him before his E will save him.

Unless you ult and the person has no escape move (Zhonya,blink,etc.) then you are applying more damage by initiating with your e+w combo. I believe his q also resets the aa time so a q after 1 aa stacks even more.

You Q applies the damage of your W without having to auto attack, so then you can still get some AA's in, ignite and E out of tower range. That's why you lead with Q+W.

(i have died many a time to that combo)

And if your level 6 of course you fit in your ult after the Q+W or on your way out to finish em off.

i fine myself killing people without needing a couple AA's and ignite with my ult. It' s a simple R+E+W(AA)+Q. since the target is slowed i go in front and I q to get away from turret or get closer to mine
another tip, right before ur about to mount again, autoattack whatever you need to mount, and while ur mounting you can use pocket pistol to knock back and then E away when skaarl gets to you
Another tip is his second e can go through walls in order to reach it's target. Also his R will relocate if an area gets walled off.

have you tried using his e through walls? it doesn't work. i'm pretty sure the tooltip actually says you can't dash through walls.

EDIT: i am an idiot and illiterate. you said second e. my humblest apologies.

> [{quoted}](name=The 2nd Horseman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YRT2wgd8,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-08-14T14:50:25.667+0000)
>
> Another tip is his second e can go through walls in order to reach it's target. Also his R will relocate if an area gets walled off.

for exampe by anivia wall or taliyah

Another tip: If your Q happens to latch onto say an invisible twitch it'll force them out of stealth. Least that's what happened in my last game, threw out a random Q for CS and ended up snagging an invisible twitch.
Fizz mains have down voted this thread lol {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Thank you!  More people need to use this board to ask for gameplay tips or to provide advice.
